desc: BFGoodrich Off Road windshield wiper blades. Made for trucks, Jeeps, SUVs and 4x4's. The extreme performance wiper solution for mud, bugs, grime, rain and snow. Built on BFG. We are built for it.

layout.text: The new BFGoodrich® Off Road wiper blades are made for Trucks, Jeeps, SUVs, 4 x 4s, Off-Road and On-Road Driving. Finally, wipers built as tough as what you drive.
